scripts.build.server: vite build -c adapters/fastly/vite.config.ts && npx @fastly/compute-js-static-publish --build-static && js-compute-runtime dist/index.js bin/main.wasm

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
lines: Now you can build and deploy to Fastly with:
- pnpm run build: production build for Fastly
- pnpm run deploy: it will use the Fastly CLI to deploy your site
